mapper.select: SELECT tbmt.boardNo , tbmt.boardTypeCd , tbmt.title , tbmt.contents , tbmt.viewType , tbmt.regUser , tbmt.regDt , tbmt.updUser , tbmt.updDt , tbdc.useReply , tbdc.useNickname FROM tbBoardMaster tbmt INNER JOIN tbBoardUgc tbdc ON tbdc.boardNo = tbmt.boardNo WHERE tbmt.viewType = '01' AND tbmt.boardTypeCd = #{boardTypeCd}
